venue.name: Irish Cultural Centre of New England

item.description:
Roulette, Black Jack, Craps, Sit &Go Poker, Spin a Wheel and More!!

Casino Night Entrance Admission: $50 per person
(includes entry into casino night and $1500 in casino “play” chips)
Prizes will be awarded to the Top 3 chip holders at the end of the evening!
Grand Prize: 42 inch Plasma Flat Screen TV

Texas Hold Em Tournament Admission: $150 per person
(includes entry into tournament, $3,000 in poker chips & $1,000 in casino “play” chips)
Prizes will be awarded to the Top 3 players (finalists)!
Grand Prize: American Express Gift Card (amount to be determined based on # of players)
Only 117 seats will be sold!

Hors d’ oeuvres, Entertainment, Live and Silent Auction and Cash Bar!
For more information or for tickets please call 781-821-8291 or visit www.irishculture.org.
item.why: An opportunity to meet up for a fun Vegas Style evening of Casino games and Poker while supporting a worth while organization, the Irish Cultural Centre of New England. The monies will be used to support the ongoing mission of the Centre.
item.name: Luck of the Irish Casino Night Fundraiser and Texas Hold Em Tournament
